attributes.action: Ban the sale of alcohol in the Palace of Westminster
attributes.additional_details: To reflect the gravity of the work that takes place in the Palace of Westminster, and also to bring Parliament into harmony with other UK places of work
attributes.background: To remove all alcohol sale from the Palace of Westminster

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Ban alcohol in the Houses of Parliament and all government buildings
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/604101
